text: Concert music may refer to *Brass band, music performed by brass ensembles *Classical music, the art music produced in, or rooted in, the traditions of Western liturgical and secular music, encompassing a broad period from roughly the 9th century to present times **Orchestral music, as distinct from chamber music *Concert band, music performed by wind ensembles *Light music, 20th Century light orchestral music ==See also== *Konzertmusik for Brass and String Orchestra, a composition by Paul Hindemith
title: Concert music
